nodes.text: The koshar melon was a type of melon that grew on a vine and could be found on the Outer Rim planet Akiva. While living on Akiva around 34 ABY, retired pilots Wedge Antilles and Norra Wexley grew a koshar melon vine in their home's garden among other plants.

The koshar melon first appeared in Resistance Reborn, a novel written by Rebecca Roanhorse and released on November 5, 2019. It was first revealed in an excerpt for the novel released on October 28, 2019.
